resources.string: The player needs to collect 100 gold coins before he gets 100 pirate signs. If a player has two pirate symbols, he gets 30 pirate signs, if three pirate symbols - 60 pirate signs and so on. If a player has two symbols of a parrot - he gets 10 pirate signs, if three characters of a parrot - 20 pirate signs and so on. If the player has two symbols of the ship - he receives 30 gold coins, if three symbols of the ship - 60 gold coins and so on. If the player has two symbols of the helm - he receives 10 gold coins, if three symbols of the wheel - 20 gold coins and so on.
